title: Chopsticks
description: A pair of equal-length chopsticks, an eating utensil used throughout East Asia. Design and color vary widely by platform, though often red or wood-colored and with tips angled together. Featured in many platforms' Steaming Bowl of Food and Takeout Box. A counterpart to utensils such as Fork and Knife and Spoon.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the chopsticks emoji are depicted as two sleek, polished wooden utensils, poised side-by-side, ready to grasp. Apple's meticulous attention to detail is evident in the subtle wood grain texture and the way light reflects off their smooth, rounded surfaces. These elegantly rendered chopsticks symbolize dining, Asian cuisine, and the simple act of sharing a meal, bringing a touch of sophisticated culinary communication to your messages.
